sentences.sContent: He helped energize and mobilize millions of people around the nation.
sentences.sCn: 他参与激励并动员了全国数百万人。

sentences.sContent: I am completely energized and feeling terrific.
sentences.sCn: 我现在充满了活力，感觉棒极了。

words.tran: 激发器，增能器；情绪兴奋剂
供给…能量；使精力充沛（等于energize）

trans.tranOther: To energize someone means to give them the enthusiasm and determination to do something
